original_text: And it shall come to pass in the last days, saith God, I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh: and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy, and your young men shall see visions, and your old men shall dream dreams:
korean_text: 하나님이 말씀하시기를 말세에 내가 내 영을 모든 육체에 부어 주리니 너희의 자녀들은 예언할 것이요 너희의 젊은이들은 환상을 보고 너희의 늙은이들은 꿈을 꾸리라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass in the last days,
I will pour out of my Spirit
and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy,
and your young men shall see visions,
and your old men shall dream dreams:
